column4: the only think stopping me from moving from Windows to Ubunu (as with many other people in South Africa) is that I cannot use my 3G phone as a Bluetooth modem
Can you use it through a wired tether over USB? Sometimes that works when BlueTooth doesnÂ´t
You might try browsing ubuntuforums.org and possibly posting your problem there. They take longer to solve problems than here, but they tend to be very good for complicated ones
